RULES.1: After logging in, you will see a list of waiting rooms.
RULES.2: You can create or join a room (max. 5 players).
RULES.3: Each player chooses a number between 0 and 100.
RULES.4: The result is the rounded average Ã— 0.8.
RULES.5: The player closest to the result wins.
RULES.6: Others lose a point. -10 means elimination.
RULES.7: With each elimination, a new rule is added.
RULES.8: The game ends when only one player remains.
